body:
Well, this is gonna be a bit of a controversial post, I can already tell. 
To start off, I'm gonna stick this right here, since it's no secret: http://avicus.net/infractions/74579
Tempbanned for hacking (Please note this is not a ban appeal, I'm unbanned now). I won't plead guilty, I did hack on avicus, I honestly can't say any reason other than that I was bored. Just earlier today, I saw this on the youtubez: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUDmVZdEnmo&list=UUeBuIjU_86wuswh9-6DeLhg This was filmed before I was banned, and I want to clear up any controversy about this being new, as I don't want to be banned again. I realized while banned that all the minigames on avicus really are unique, and you can't find a replacement. I have 100% stopped hacking/cheating/abusing glitches/not following the rules at all since then. I just made this post to say that I want to be a good player on this server and the next ones to come, not known as "that hacker guy". I really hope you guys can forgive me for that, and I look forward to minigames to come c:

(On another note, some people asked me why there is a green dot on my face. My character's hat is a headset which is also black and the mic part is green, you would have to see me in-game for it to make sense.)

To start off, I'm gonna stick this right here, since it's no secret: http://avicus.net/infractions/74579
Tempbanned for hacking (Please note this is not a ban appeal, I'm unbanned now). I won't plead guilty, I did hack on avicus, I honestly can't say any reason other than that I was bored. Just earlier today, I saw this on the youtubez: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IUDmVZdEnmo&list=UUeBuIjU_86wuswh9-6DeLhg This was filmed before I was banned, and I want to clear up any controversy about this being new, as I don't want to be banned again. I realized while banned that all the minigames on avicus really are unique, and you can't find a replacement. I have 100% stopped hacking/cheating/abusing glitches/not following the rules at all since then. I just made this post to say that I want to be a good player on this server and the next ones to come, not known as "that hacker guy". I really hope you guys can forgive me for that, and I look forward to minigames to come c:

(On another note, some people asked me why there is a green dot on my face. My character's hat is a headset which is also black and the mic part is green, you would have to see me in-game for it to make sense.)
title: A quick story about me

replies.body: Edit: I'm a nub and read that wrong .-.
replies.body_tagged: Edit: I'm a nub and read that wrong .-.

replies.body:
He said he is unbanned.
Anyway I hope that you have indeed learned your lesson and will follow the rules from here on. It takes a certain level of courage to admit you were wrong so well done for that.

replies.body:
Thanks for your honesty, it's hard to do that especially in a server where many people are familiar with each other.
And I forgive you ;)
